sections.heading: supervision, defined.Appropriate supervision means the specific type, intensity, and frequency of supervision determined by an assessment of a combination of factors, which include discipline, level of education and experience of the supervisee, and assigned level of responsibility

sections.text:
38-1803.01.Appropriate supervision, defined.

Appropriate supervision means the specific type, intensity, and frequency of supervision determined by an assessment of a combination of factors, which include discipline, level of education and experience of the supervisee, and assigned level of responsibility.

SourceLaws 2023, LB227, ยง 27.
